Joseph Pilato https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Pilato 0 Joseph Pilato (born March 16, 1949) is an American film and voice actor. He is perhaps best known for his performance as Captain Rhodes in the 1985 film Day of the Dead. Joseph_Pilato ( born March_16_,_1949 ) is an_American_film_and_voice_actor . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_performance as Captain_Rhodes in the_1985_film_Day of the_Dead .
